constructor.details: Sets up the factory with meta-transaction support

params.forwarder: The address of the trusted forwarder for meta-transactions

create((address,address,address,uint256).details: Uses CREATE2 for deterministic addresses, includes reentrancy protection, and validates that the predicted address hasn't been used before.

params.autoExecute: If true, settlement executes automatically when all approvals are received
params.cutoffDate: Timestamp after which the settlement expires
params.flows: The array of token flows to include in the settlement

returns.contractAddress: The address of the newly created settlement contract

isAddressDeployed(address).details: Returns true if the address was created by this factory, false otherwise

returns._0: True if the address was created by this factory, false otherwise

isTrustedForwarder(address).details: Indicates whether any particular address is the trusted forwarder.

predictAddress((address,address,address,.details: Calculates the deterministic address using CREATE2 with the same parameters and salt computation as the create function. This allows users to know the contract's address before deployment.

params.autoExecute: If true, settlement executes automatically when all approvals are received
params.cutoffDate: Timestamp after which the settlement expires
params.flows: The array of token flows that will be used in deployment

returns.predicted: The address where the settlement contract would be deployed

trustedForwarder().details: Returns the address of the trusted forwarder.

isAddressDeployed(address).notice: Checks if an address was deployed by this factory

isFactoryContract(address).notice: Mapping to track if an address was deployed by this factory

predictAddress((address,address,address,.notice: Predicts the address where a XvPSettlement contract would be deployed
